abstract: One of the network's biggest stars announces her divorce, and executives on Monday were discussing whether to pull from the schedule "Kim's Fairytale Wedding: A Kardashian Event."
snippet: One of the network's biggest stars announces her divorce, and executives on Monday were discussing whether to pull from the schedule "Kim's Fairytale Wedding: A Kardashian Event."
lead_paragraph: One of the biggest stars on the E! network, Kim Kardashian, said Monday that she was separating from her husband, Kris Humphries, 72 days after an extravagant, literally made-for-television wedding. Ms. Kardashian cited irreconcilable differences, but some of her fans and detractors sensed a business decision. Ms. Kardashian, after all, had earned millions of dollars by selling the television rights to her Aug. 20 wedding to E!, which has shown Kardashian family reality shows for several years. E! made the most of it, premiering "Kim's Fairytale Wedding: A Kardashian Event" on Oct. 9 and 10 and replaying it almost every day since then.

headline.main: Kardashian Divorce Forces the E! Network to Scramble
